Review Text: Entering this place makes you feel like you've traveled far. Designed like a gallery but also like a traditional home, with every detail taken care of. Incredibly delicious food, rich in flavor and fresh. The owners are very warm and welcoming. Definitely will be back!

Name: Semai
Review Text: Really excellent food. Never had Eritrean before, but I'll certainly have it again.

Name: Semai
Review Text: AMAZING! Loved the food, service, the atmosphere, the owners, everything. We shared a plate of mixed vegetarians and meat stews while drinking abyssinian tea. I look forward to the next time and try other things from the menu!

Name: Semai
Review Text: Amazing Eritrean food.  Honey wine is an interesting drink.

Name: Semai

For 2 people, we always take the combination of 3 vegetarian/vegan dishes. And it‚Äôs cheap as well!

Name: Semai
Review Text: Fantastic food, I was particularly impressed by the injera, a type of fermented teff flatbread that came with the food. Really, really excellent stuff.

Name: Semai
Review Text: First time I came to this restaurant was completely by chance. We had been to Amsterdam Noord, it was about 22:00 and we found Semai, open and with vegan options. What an amazing surprise! The vegan food there is absolutely delicious. The ‚Ä¶

Name: Semai
Review Text:
A coffee lover's heaven. If you want to be a bit adventurous order the coffee bean ceremony. It's delightful and a long way away from those hipster cafes.
I love this place. It has become a new favourite of mine as I live just around ‚Ä¶

Name: Semai
Review Text: I have been through many Eritrean/Ethiopian restaurants and this one by far is the most amazing of all. I ordered Zigni, Kitfo, Tibsy and Omg! This made my mother‚Äôs cooking taste bad. Btw, my mother is an amazing cook but this restaurant is something. I will def def stop by here every time I come to Amsterdam.

Name: Semai
Review Text: Yesterday me and a friend went to dinner in this great Eritrean Ethiopian restaurant. We did not know what to expect. From the outside it does not look special, but once you walk in you get into a complete different atmosphere. Almost holiday feeling. The staff were very kind and the food is delicious. Highly recommended!

Name: Semai
Review Text: Simple, authentic and friendly place. The pancakes that is the plate you eat with your hands from are made with an Ethiopian grain that adds a nice acidity. ‚Ä¶

Name: Semai
Review Text: Outstanding! Great service, fantastic food! Honestly, the food is better than in most places in Ethiopia that I tried when I was there.  Very chilled atmosphere, would definitely recommend this restaurant! We are coming back for sure!

Name: Semai
Review Text: Very nice place to enjoy original African food they even import most of the ingredients from Ethiopia. Charming ambience cultural service, delicious food, original East African music and decorations. Reasonable pricing. All that makes  you wanna come back

Name: Semai
Review Text: I‚Äôve kind of had it with this restaurant. Ordered from them through Deliveroo 3-4 times, and every time they managed to screw up the packaging, with oily fluids leaking on my floor upon arrival. That, as an incident could be a Deliveroo ‚Ä¶

Name: Semai
Review Text:
I got there because it was the only place serving food late, but the food was so good, I would return at any hour!
They also accept credit cards (Holland is usually problematic with that) and even send you the invoice on email if you want (just the small things that only I care about üòâ)

Name: Semai
Review Text: Yummy food, tangy injera, large portions, most dishes 10-15 euro, friendly service, fun atmosphere! Had lentil and fish dishes, really loved the fish.

Name: Semai
Review Text: Not the easiest to find, but super tasty food, a great vibe and brilliant staff. I love Ethiopian food, and this is great stuff. Plus a roomy, yet cosy space. Well worth a detour! Did I mention great prices?
